name: Sea Lion

trait.name: Amphibious
text: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Swimming Leap
text: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

description:
These large marine mammals live along coastal regions and around islands at sea
Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 242, Locathah Rising, Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 252
